snippet: Studies are confirming what parents have known for generations: A little exercise can lead to a good night’s sleep.
abstract: New research confirms that moderate daily exercise can help adults over the ages of 60 sleep better at night; amount of activity needed to improve sleep quality is surprising, with activities like gardening and walking the dog being enough to reap benefits.
lead_paragraph: Studies are confirming what parents have known for generations: A little exercise can lead to a good night’s sleep.

headline.seo: To Fall Asleep, Get Off the Couch
headline.main: To Fall Asleep, Get Off the Couch
headline.print_headline: To Fall Asleep, Get Off the Couch
